H3.text: when the atlanta braves won the world series. 1995 World Series

A4.text: the Braves won in six games to capture their third World Series championship in franchise history (along with 1914 in Boston and 1957 in Milwaukee)

A5.text: Atlanta returned to the Series the following year, but lost to the New York Yankees in six games
